name: runner (itch) (Crown Games)
description:
runner is a retro arcade game in which you must collect a coin. each time you collect the coin a tile on the terrain changes into either lava (which kills you when you step on it) or mountain (which you cannot pass through).

there is also a timer of a few seconds that resets when you collect the coin.

at one point a scorpion will start chasing you.
